documentation.

## Developer Guide

If you are new to using `nbdev` here are some useful pointers to get you
started.

### Install testnbdev3 in Development mode

``` sh
# make sure testnbdev3 package is installed in development mode
$ pip install -e .

# make changes under nbs/ directory
# ...

# compile to have changes apply to testnbdev3
$ nbdev_prepare
```

## Usage

### Installation

Install latest from the GitHub
[repository](https://github.com/perceptualrobots/testnbdev3):

``` sh
$ pip install git+https://github.com/perceptualrobots/testnbdev3.git
```

or from [conda](https://anaconda.org/perceptualrobots/testnbdev3)

``` sh
$ conda install -c perceptualrobots testnbdev3
```

or from [pypi](https://pypi.org/project/testnbdev3/)

``` sh
$ pip install testnbdev3
```

### Documentation

Documentation can be found hosted on this GitHub
[repository](https://github.com/perceptualrobots/testnbdev3)’s
[pages](https://perceptualrobots.github.io/testnbdev3/). Additionally
you can find package manager specific guidelines on
[conda](https://anaconda.org/perceptualrobots/testnbdev3) and
[pypi](https://pypi.org/project/testnbdev3/) respectively.
